prodNameC: 巴斯銳 鏈球菌(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
1.	PASTORX STREP
A, B, C, D, F, G: Six vials of 1 ml of latex suspension, specific for group A, B, C, D, F, and G streptococci, respectively. The latex particles are coated with group-specific rabbit immunoglobulins in suspension in a glycine buffer, pH 8.2, containing 0.01% thimerosal and 0.1% sodium azide as the preservatives.
Extraction enzyme: two vials of freeze-dried extraction enzyme in TRIS, containing 0.01% thimerosal. 
Positive control: one vial of 1.5 ml polyvalent positive control antigen, made of an extracts mixture of Lancefield of group A, B, C, D, F, and G streptococci and 0.02% thimerosal as preservative.
Disposable rods
Sixty disposable agglutination cards
2.	PASTOREX STREP INDIVIDUAL LATEX TESTS
PASTOREX STREP A
PASTOREX STREP B
PASTOREX STREP D
3.	PASTOREX STREP extraction enzyme
4.	PASTOREX STREP disposable agglutination cards
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 利用乳膠凝集法區分鏈球菌之菌群

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3740 鏈球菌屬血清試劑
